Subject: EPP not applying CAP policies
Description: As of this morning, EPP is not applying CAP policies on my machine after a restart and allowing any transfer of sensitive information. The system is active. My machine is targeted with the block policy. Connection with the server is ACTIVE. I've tried several system reboots and policy updates without any success. Please treat this with high priority.
Solution_Comment__c: Resolved during a remote session - The Intercept VPN Traffic had to be enabled in solve this
